item.description:
Hey Guys,

Here's a deal I found on livingsocial for Go Karting. Looks like fun. -- only 2 more days to buy the tickets at this price though.

http://www.livingsocial.com/cities/1843/deals/317806-kart-race-1-day-kart-license

It was all fun, fun, fun until Daddy took the T-bird away -- or, more likely, 93 traffic put the brakes on your little red Corvette. Let today's deal at F1 Boston in Braintree get you on the road again. Pay $19 for a one-day kart license and one indoor track race (a $38 value). Or, relax trackside with $24 worth of food and non-alcoholic drinks for just $12 at Ascari Restaurant, which overlooks Track 1. Choose from two multi-level kart courses, designed to delight both novice and experienced racers. After you've crushed some corkscrew turns, shift gears and fuel up on Ascari's pizzas, salads, sandwiches, pastas, and burgers. If tasty grub and full-throttle track action isn't enough, the half-off discount will be sure to rev your inner engine.

Want more? Check out F1 Boston on Facebook.

PAID VALUE DOES NOT EXPIRE PROMOTIONAL VALUE EXPIRES ON October 30, 2012
item.name: Kart Race - F1 Boston
